type: Tutorial Step - Let's Get On With It!

definition.text: The tricky bit is when the destination node is far away from the originator node, maybe even in different hierarchies!

paragraphs.text: These UI tricks may make your life easier:
Use the design space map as many times as required to find your way from node to node.
Pin the node you are going to move across the design space, so that you may drop it at any point to check the design space map for directions.
Use Ctrl / Cmd + arrow keys to drag the node across the screen after clicking on it with the mouse. Keep keys pressed and the node flies!
Remove the pin once the reference is established so that the node goes back to its place.
